website_summaries.verdict: The only weather-resistant 50x megazoom camera around, the Fujifilm FinePix S1 is a fast, flexible camera that comes up a little short in low-light photo quality.
pros: The Fujifilm FinePix S1 is a quick-shooting bridge camera with a nice 50x zoom lens, built-in Wi-Fi, and excellent build quality that's weather resistant
It has lots of shooting options and extras like a hot shoe, vari-angle LCD and EVF, raw capture, and manual controls
cons: Noisy, soft photos in low-light conditions/indoors, which might be hard to reconcile given its price
Mobile app could use some love

customer_reviews.title: Great grab and go camera!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to camera for five years now, and it still is my fave camera, even though i have two expensive Canon cameras with very nice lenses! Its just quick and easy to grab and go! Great pictures, thats all i need to know!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne C. Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. We got this camera on cyber Monday for a fantastic price. Strengths: - water and sandproof - incredible zoom - really great pictures at daytime / when the sun is out - great movies Cons: - weaknesses at nighttime and after sunset - the button where to start recording a movie is in a non-intuitive position. I am using the camera for several months now but I still don't find the button intuitively.
customer_reviews.author: La Jolla Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brief enjoyment. That was it.
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures, but after a month's worth of use, everything froze. Now, nine months after purchase and spotted use, here's what they tell me: "We were very disappointed to learn that you had experienced a problem with your digital camera. Based on the information in your email, it appears your camera is in need of repair. Unfortunately, we no longer have parts to repair the FinePix S1 Pro digital camera. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience this matter may have caused you. If you should have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us in the future. It would be our pleasure to assist you again." That's it ! Fujifim: adieu !
customer_reviews.author: Silesia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Coming from pro Nikon cameras this is a step back. But versatility and options it's good. Image quality is good. Image processing is good. Fuji studio I'm not fluent in. Save files... Still struggling with it. Where do original files go? My bad. I'm used to ps. Shutter lag is hard to get used to. Like the flip around view screen. Very good for most people. Zoom is outstanding. 1200 equivalent. Would like to see f22 for macro or scenic work.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller and Great Product Period!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, look and feel of a much more expensive DSLR. Well packaged, shipped and received much sooner than expected. I purchased this camera after much investigation of bridge cameras through many sources and came up with this being the best built and functioning camera in a great price range. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect complement to my iPhone camera. Ordinarily you would think it would be the other way around, however I use my iPhone as my primary camera. When I need a lens with longer reach, the Fuji FinePix S1 fits the slot well. It is easy to transfer images from camera to phone for editing and upload to internet. These cameras are hard to find, but if I could find another new one. I would buy it.
customer_reviews.author: D Royall

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. I'm no photographer, so I don't have the technical knowledge to give an in-depth review, but it's been great for my needs as a real estate professional. The battery is large and holds a charge for a long time, and you don't have to remove it from the camera to recharge it. The zoom is my favorite feature. I can get a close-up of the address on a mailbox from 100 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Yocona

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for taking pictures of your kids (or other moving objects).
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we had a little one on the way and wanted a camera that would take pictures of moving objects as children are not stationary as we learned with our nieces and nephews. And this camera works great with that! There's many more benefits to it including the ap "FUJIFILM Camera Remote" (don't get any other ap, its confusing, but this is the one to get) which includes good picture transfer as well as an actual remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I have three S-1 two new version and one old. One in each vehicle I own and one in the house. You never know when the million dollar shot will come up.
customer_reviews.author: R.L. Bush

customer_reviews.title: A Step up from our previous Fuji Cameras
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife and she is thrilled. It's comfortable for her to use with easy to understand settings. She is an artist and needed a camera that could give consistent, clear still pictures of her products and still allow her to make demonstration videos. The camera's viewing screen pivots so she can see what is being taped. It has an easily accessible zoom, and it has a built in microphone that she needed. The product was safely packed and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: photojunkie

customer_reviews.title: Confused
customer_reviews.text: When I received it .... I was super happy but had to update my review ....I am having problems with it now ....it could be just some of the settings that were changed and maybe I need to change them once again ? Downloaded a guide/ owner's manual hope that helps ! Otherwise I'll feel like I wasted $300. 00 ....
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johanneson

customer_reviews.title: FUJIFILM FINEPIX S1 ALL WEATHER CAMERA W/50X ZOOM
customer_reviews.text: Fuji s1 camera was bought on reviews from the Amazon website plus other reviews from other camera websites I've received it and I've had it now for about a month and a half very easy to use very easy to navigate around with and the zoom capabilities are outstanding highly recommend this product to anyone that has or needs a digital camera with a great viewing area! The accessories for the s1 are also very good well priced and worth the money in value I would highly recommend the Fuji x1 camera to anyone beginner or expert this is a great all-weather camera!
customer_reviews.author: RONZONI

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera, Water Resistant.
customer_reviews.text: At this moment. This maybe the better "bridge camera" to buy if you are in the market. The lens is very sharp. Using the camera settings, you can enhanced the photo experience. Additional it maybe the only bridge camera built to with-stand the elements. This is Not for scuba diving, or throwing across the room. Is simply a water resistant bridge camera which takes good pictures. My opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning how to use this camera. I'm loving it so far. Very easy to use. I'm trying to use it for action shots of my boys playing basketball. Still trying to get them clear. I like that the battery charges inside of the camera. I also LOVE the way it connects with my android phone. Makes it simple to share photos and print at a store.
customer_reviews.author: AnnM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the amateur photographer who wants to step it ...
customer_reviews.text: the highlights to this camera are the zoom and the durability. Perfect for the amateur photographer who wants to step it up. I've taken baseball pictures from the upper decks of stadiums framing the batter mid-swing in pristine focus. Pictures of birds come out clearly enough to see individual feathers.
customer_reviews.author: nopitz

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT camera for step up from point and shoot.  Many options!  Can be automatic too.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! The perfect step up from a point and shoot for me. I love taking pictures, but have no time to learn the technical details just now. Busy life. This camera lets me choose between automatic and manual, with many choices of settings and effects. Nice zoom. Takes video too. I got this for a very good price before Black Friday. Thrilled with this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It makes me happy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for this camera because it is kind of old model and hard to find. In all super zoom cameras this has really high level photo quality. I bought it second hand, renewed and it looks clear, working. I am happy about this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Aydin Gulec

customer_reviews.title: it takes good pictures but seems to not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: I have had this one year and already the connection to my computer has failed....it takes good pictures but seems to not hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: N B.

customer_reviews.title: especially remote control with Samsung smart phone, is great
customer_reviews.text: Seller shipped camera right on promised schedule. Works well after one week of testing. WiFi capability, especially remote control with Samsung smart phone, is great. RAW output simultaneously with jpg is a great option, not generally available with super-zooms. Images are excellent in all the modes I've tested so far. Very happy with the purchase at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than my older
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my older, lower-quality camera. It's a good intermediate camera - better than a beginner's camera, but not super-fancy, either. It's great for me to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Larson

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera and it does a lot for the money. A trusted brand, this was one of several that were recommended to us by a family member who has a lot of experience with digital cameras and taking wildlife photos.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good all around budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start my new hobby in birding and chose this camera because I am on a budget and it was the only bridge type camera that is weather resistant. I have been using it for a month now and I love it. It does everything I want and need. It is easy to use and the images look great.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in most ways
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in most ways. Biggest gripe is strobe is completely inop in any mode. Luckily didn't pose a big problem on our trip, but received the camera too late to change before departure. Bulk of photos were great, the big zoom definetly worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my camera
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my camera. I got what I paid for. It's not the best sports camera on the market... you'd have to spend $800-$1000 for that... this was only $279 and it takes GREAT pictures! you just need to learn the manual settings and action shots are a breeze. Video is great too. I use this for our soccer team and create a great yearbook and banquet video!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camera does everything it claims very good. It makes very clear long range shots
customer_reviews.text: The camera does everything it claims very good. It makes very clear long range shots. I specifically like vary-angle LCD and remote control through android app. The build quality is quite good, it feels good to hold the camera in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: testedit

customer_reviews.title: Superb features with excellent zoom of which I really like
customer_reviews.text: Superb features with excellent zoom of which I really like. Excellent for wildlife photography. Feels very good in the hands, due to it's construction. To me, it is a versatile, excellent picture taker.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: FinePix S1
customer_reviews.text: I love the Fujifilm FinePix S1. It takes great pictures and I don't have to carry several different lenses as the S1 has a 24mm to 1200mm lense.
customer_reviews.author: Quanah

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera with great features and battery life. It worked beautifully and easily right out of the box. Fujifilm makes fine camedas and seem to offer better value for price than others. This was a factory refubished one and even better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for all photo opportunities.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera as a secondary for my Nikon. I am impressed with the telephoto capabilities of this camera. Two reasons for my purchase; Fugi makes great products and the lense is fixed. I plan to use it when I need something quick and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: PBW

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this camera, but I miss the zoom quality I had with my previous one. I'm still trying to figure it all the features, especially connecting to Wi-Fi. Overall, I feel thus us a poetry good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mid level camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend and we've both used this camera. It gets some amazing shot (was able to get the craters on the moon!). Use it all the time for both family gatherings and out in nature.
customer_reviews.author: Corey W

customer_reviews.title: ... pictures and video but what I have taken looks good. The camera has a well made feel
customer_reviews.text: Have only taken a few pictures and video but what I have taken looks good. The camera has a well made feel. There are a lot of features that I really like. Such as ability to take extra pictures before and after you press the shutter. I am always late trying to capture live action. Over all very happy with the limited time I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice camera and is very reliable when every I need to take photos. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a refurbished, some little scratch in the front but doesn't affect the work. VERY GOOD DEAL!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Benavente

customer_reviews.title: This camera over heated before I ever got to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera over heated before I ever got to use it and it never cooled back down. Why a camera would over heat in an air conditioned house, I don't know...
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it and the ad said that it was the camera, however, I received not only the camera, but a memory card, and a camera case!!! I've barley used it but I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I'm not a professional and have only had this camera for 2 months but in that time it has been exactly what I was expecting. it is perfect for me because I wanted more than a point and shoot camera but not a professional type camera and this one fits perfectly between them. The only negative I would say is that you can't send to Facebook or email straight from the camera but you can tag the pictures to do either as soon as you connect to your computer or phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera! Great for a travel camera.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera, I bought it as a replacement for my Fiji fine pix 3200. Awesome refinement of any and all short comings of my old camera! Would recommend it to anyone that wants a high spec travel camera.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery from Global
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery from Global, recieved within a day of ordering. Like the camera so far...Have taken portraits and long distance. Photo color and imaging is fine. Impressed with the zoom....photo's taken are very clear
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: JPG quality really kills it. Everything else would have been great, but the end result is nowhere even close to what the competition has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THE CAMERA IS GREAT IT WILL MAKE THE PERFECT CHRISTMAS PRESENT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring the camera out but so far I love it!

customer_reviews.title: works great. very versatile
customer_reviews.text: a deal vs other cameras. works great. very versatile. highly recommended.

customer_reviews.text: The Quality of the the pictures is very high and the user interface is easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the remote from my Android phone and the 50X zoom.

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice camera. Takes lovely pics
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice camera. Takes lovely pics. I am still trying to figure out all it can do. Love it

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased with camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with camera. Lots of features that I will probably never use. Takes very good telephoto pictures even without at tripod. Only bridge camera that is dust proof and water proof.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera is absolutely cool! I would have expected, though, some software with applications

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I have ever owned. It is the do everything camera and you can even do it all in inclement weather.

customer_reviews.title: GRANDSON LOVES CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our grandson and he loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Great slr camera.
customer_reviews.text: Started using camera in Africa and am loving it. Takes great pictures and wonderful video as well! Has loads of features I may never get to, yet it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan L. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bough this a year ago and just love the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Clark D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great bridge camera !
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, no problems so far, takes enough good pictures for me, I just bought it for my next trip to Europe, I will update my review when I come back.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Got my camera today!!! So far so good!!! The pictures look great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Viviane Da Costa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All weather is a great feature for a zoom camera camera takes great pictures
customer_reviews.author: Love oversized watches

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, It's my go to camera for all of my basic shoots.
customer_reviews.author: LKPROCOM

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I expected with the exception of not being able to take filters. Filters have always been such an integral part of goo photography that I never thought to check. They made up for it, however, with an HDR mode in the advance setting on the dial. Still I often used a UV filter to protect my lens. even though in over 40 years of photography, I have never scratched a single lens and I did not always use a filter to cover them all. But then I have life insurance and I have never died before. It does as advertised and I would buy it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This a one fine camera for its class and cost.
customer_reviews.author: djpdx

customer_reviews.title: Bad gurarantee service
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. Better than my previous. The result is not always what I see, several attempts with different express and advanced setting could help. Unfortunately the connection with the smart phone does not work. I contacted the service. Their service is very bad. They ask for warranty card that does not exist in the set, ask me to send the camera on my expenses for evaluation. I should not risk to send my new and otherwise working camera to such a service for a function that did not work just from the beginning and there are no guarantee that will be diagnosed and repaired. The option to receive a refurbished camera instead of the brand new is also ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: David BenJoseph

customer_reviews.title: Extended zoom
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with initial results.... I purchased for the quality of extended zoom.... there may be greater zooms, but it's the resolution that counts in the end.
customer_reviews.author: rgar670

customer_reviews.title: ... this camera for a couple weeks now and I love it. Works great for taking photos of wildlife
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera for a couple weeks now and I love it. Works great for taking photos of wildlife. the zoom on it is incredible.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for it's price. Small and light. Hard to focus on max zoom.

customer_reviews.text: Still a lot to learn. Very easy to use. Seems fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: dose as good as a

customer_reviews.text: Great camera with a great price. Easy to use menu.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: awsome camera 📷
customer_reviews.text: Camera is awesome got it for a great deal. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 3 year old mid level Fujifilm camera with this one. Still figuring out all the extra features this camera has over the old one but basic function was the same as the old one but with better zoom and clearer pictures. I looked at a lot of cameras before staying with the Fujifilm, I think I will be a customer for life. Also this is my fourth Fujifilm camera, never any issues with a single one they all still work even the one I purchased over 10 years ago...............................srg
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R Grant

customer_reviews.title: We love this new camera
customer_reviews.text: We love this new camera. The only complaint we have is with the software for transferring images over wifi to our iPad. It's super clunky and slow if you're trying to do more than just a couple. I would hope a software update would let me change this review to 5 stars in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: J. St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: FinePix S1 is an excellent bridge camera
customer_reviews.text: See Kort's review plus comments for the full story. Features I most like include 1200mm (equiv.) zoom, much better image resolution and clarity than Fuji's HS50, good battery life (intervalometer took a JPeg and RAF [RAW] image of bald eagles every 15 seconds for 6 hours including a rain storm), water and dust resistance, and WiFi control. Negatives include the tiny sensor doesn't handle low light very well and documentation fails to point out that digital zoom is deactivated if you elect to save RAW ("RAF") files. Now mid-2017 and I've taken many thousands of bald eagle photos with this camera in rain and dusty winds -- great results, especially when using RAW (RAF) files.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, works flawlessly and CMOS sensor is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, works flawlessly and CMOS sensor is very sensitive and advantage of being able to record HD video is a big plus. This type of camera sure does make it easier as to not have to hang a heavy SLR around your neck, liberate yourself!
customer_reviews.author: JCFH

customer_reviews.title: You will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding camera. It's as good as my Nikon DSLR and a whole lot easier to use. And the zoom! Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: CasTrav

customer_reviews.title: GREAT picture quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this camera. Purchased it for a trip to Yellowstone. The color a clarity of the landscape photos are awesome. I previously owned a Cannon with an 80x digital zoom. This Fuji has a 50x which was enough and still provided clear images of wildlife. Camera does great indoor pics and has been great for outdoor sports. All around very great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some good some not so good
customer_reviews.text: The camera delivers good to excellent pictures and has lots of great features. It is capable of saving picture files in both Jpeg and RAW. The down side is that the Fuji RAW files are not recognized by Adobe Photoshop products. Software provided by Fuji to work on RAW files is OK but does not compare with the capability available with Adobe Photoshop products. Prices do change over time, but I am disappointed in Amazon- This camera is a new model and was out about two months when I ordered it. Within two weeks of its arrival, the Amazon price has dropped $60.
customer_reviews.author: GoodStuff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera I feel I got a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A good camera which is easy to handle with many features
customer_reviews.text: A good camera which is easy to handle with many features. The only slight disappointment is that the 50x zoom was expected to zoom in a lot closer than it does. It takes about 15x zoom to zoom into the original/normal eye of the scene view then another 35 to bring it in which in fact gives about 35x. Good camera otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan L.

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased in part based on it being water resistant. We took it on a rafting trip and it failed. Yes, it did get wet but it was never submerged in water and it was in a very dry environment otherwise. We thought we had salvaged it when we got home. It worked fine for another time or two and then completely died. As I write, it is on it's way for repairs. The image quality is good for what the camera is, but I really think for the price and the manner in which it is advertised that it should have held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Anne H

customer_reviews.title: I loved my other Fuji camera however the quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved my other Fuji camera however the quality of the photos are sub par. Fuji is better then that.

customer_reviews.text: Excelent product I am so happy it is a great camera the zoom is very quickly

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix S1 16 MP Digital Camera with 3.0-Inch LCD (Black)
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended to me by a professional photographer. Since I'm not a expert on digital camera. I'm very happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Picture Quality not even close to my Nikon 5000 with VR lens but it is handy to walk around with but I have stopped using it

product_meta.title: Fujifilm FinePix S1 16 MP Digital Camera with 3.0-Inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Style:Camera OnlyThe FinePix S1 is the world’s first "weather resistant" super zoom camera and provides protection against rain and dust. Brimming with new technologies to improve picture taking and advance creativity, the S1 offers everything you could want from a bridge camera .The S1 features a 16MP CMOS sensor, and a bright 50x super zoom 24mmF2.8-1200mmF5.6 lens with ultra-fast zoom speed and 2x Intelligent Digital Zoom up to 100x. The high resolution and contrast Vari-Angle 3" LCD (920K dot) makes it easy to frame shots from any angle, and the 0.2" EVF (920K dot) is great for difficult shooting conditions. One-touch Wi-Fi connectivity lets you easily share images to your smartphone or tablet - pictures that these devices cannot capture - and remote shooting via smartphone or tablet using the Fujifilm Camera Remote app for unique capture opportunities, all wrapped in a robust dust and water-resistant body.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 * The world's first weather resistant (water resistant and dust resistant) structure in its class
 * FUJINON 50x Optical Zoom (24mm - 1200mm) & Super Macro
 * New Full HD Movie (1080p / 60 fps) with 5-Axis Image Stabilization
 * Electronic Viewfinder
 * Original "one touch" wireless transfer & Remote control
 * New Advanced Filter applicable to movies and photos

THE WORLD'S FIRST WEATHER RESISTANT (WATER RESISTANT AND DUST RESISTANT) STRUCTURE IN ITS CLASS
The lens-body integrated design and sealing on approx. 70 areas are designed to allow field photography without typical worries about the weather, season or general shooting environment.

FUJINON 50X OPTICAL ZOOM (24MM - 1200MM) & SUPER MACRO
Vast zoom range from 24mm wide-angle to 1200mm super-telephoto offers the advanced features and flexibility of a DSLR without the weight and hassle of interchangeable lenses. 3.0-stop image stabilization to reduce blurring and produce excellent results from wide angle to telephoto.

ORIGINAL "ONE TOUCH" WIRELESS COMMUNICATION TO YOUR SMARTPHONE OR PC LETS YOU SHARE HIGH IMAGE QUALITY ON THE SPOT.
You can easily transfer images wirelessly from the FinePix S1 to your smartphone or tablet after installing the free FUJIFILM Camera Remote app. There are no troublesome ID and password settings; just press the Wi-Fi button of the back of the camera and then add the images instantly to your blog or share them with friends on your social networking site. You can also use the FinePix S1's built-in Wi-Fi to save your photos to your PC.

ORIGINAL "ONE TOUCH" WIRELESS COMMUNICATION TO YOUR SMARTPHONE OR PC LETS YOU SHARE HIGH IMAGE QUALITY ON THE SPOT.
Remote photography from smartphones is possible by using the wireless communication function. The shutter as well as zoom can be remotely operated.

In addition to occasions when taking photos of wild animals, photos can be taken from a remote location to avoid environments such as rainy days and days with strong winds that blow up dust.

It is a beneficial function that fulfills the water resistant and dust resistant function to the fullest.
